name: Content Customization
description: Tests the model's ability to customize presentation content based on specific requirements and preferences

prompts.text: Create a presentation about digital marketing strategies that is fully customized for a luxury fashion brand called 'Elegance'. The presentation should reflect the brand's sophisticated aesthetic, use their brand colors (gold #D4AF37 and black #000000), incorporate fashion industry examples, and align with luxury market positioning. The content should feel specifically created for this brand, not generic.

Create a presentation about leadership development customized for a speaker with an energetic, story-driven presentation style. The speaker prefers minimal text on slides, uses personal anecdotes frequently, likes to incorporate audience interaction every 3-4 slides, and uses humor to engage audiences. Customize the presentation to match this personal presentation style.
